proveit-citoid-error:
Generic error message when something went wrong with the Citoid service
{{Identical|Error}}
proveit-citoid-load:
Default text for the button that loads a reference out of a URI through the Citoid service
{{Identical|Load}}
proveit-citoid-loading: Status text while Citoid service is loading the reference details
proveit-citoid-placeholder: Placeholder for the field that triggers the Citoid service
proveit-citoid-tooltip: Tooltip for the field that when filled with a reference identifier, triggers the Citoid service to automatically fill in the reference details
proveit-confirm-remove: Text for the alert prompted when a user tries to remove a reference with citations
proveit-filter-fields: Placeholder for the input field to filter parameters
proveit-filter-references: Placeholder for the input field to filter references
proveit-no-references: Text for when no references are found
proveit-no-template: Text for the dropdown option corresponding to the references without a template
proveit-normalize-button: Text for the button that normalizes the wikitext of all the references
proveit-normalize-message: Text for the notification warning that the normalization process may take some time
proveit-reference-content-label: Label for the field of the reference content
proveit-reference-group-label: Label for the field of the reference group
proveit-reference-name-label: Label for the field of the reference name
proveit-reference-template-label: Label for the field of the main template of the reference
proveit-reference-wikitext-label: Label for the field of the wikitext of the reference
proveit-show-all-button: Text for the button that shows all parameter fields
proveit-today-button:
Text for the button that inserts the current date
{{Identical|Today}}
